attributes.action: require ballot papers at all elections to include a choice of “none of the above” (NOTA), which shall be counted and the totals declared at all elections, and that where the NOTA votes counted exceed that of the leading candidate, the election shall be declared void and reheld.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With increasing disillusionment with the political process, it is vital that voters in any election should be given the opportunity to register this.
